Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning consists of an episodic account of Miyazawa’s childhood (including very amusing, poignant and ridiculous scenes involving his family), and the second half concerns his later years as a poet, suffering from weakness caused by tuberculosis.
